attributes.title: Trump
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever seen it does not work right a Cheetos man comes straight to your face when you open it and I don’t think anyone would want to get scared like that a huge bald Cheetos man just horrible

attributes.title: AWFULLLLL
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch like crazy. It kept saying that this orange faced man was going to “make america great again?” Why would Apple allow an app to lie to millions??? I honestly don’t get it. But anyways if I could rate it lower than 5 stars I would. XOXO- gen z🧚🏻😜👄

attributes.title: This App is horrible, don’t even try downloading it!
attributes.review: First off it took 2 days to download with McDonald’s WiFi which is the best, we all know that. So I tried hopping on a plane (Delta Airlines) with WiFi and IT STILL WOULD’NT download quick enough.

attributes.title: App was horrible
attributes.review: First let’s start with the fact that this app is one of the worst apps out there! So now we’re letting orangutans run apps? Since when?! This app should be immediately taken down! 🦧🦧🦧

attributes.title: pretty sus tbh
attributes.review: I got this app a week ago and it drains my battery so much, even when i’m not on it. It also glitches so much and there’s CONSTANTLY adds popping up. My 11 year old sister could make better. ❤️

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: Do not download this app it makes your phone glitch and I freezes your phone I don’t know why is even on the AppStore TAKE IT DOWN! also I took a lot of storage on my phone apple take this down

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever had in my life I didn’t think it would be so much like trump but the second I opened it the app attempted to “grab me by the p***sy”. I was immediately forced to delete it way too forward for me.

attributes.title: Not good vibes
attributes.review: This app is the worst app ever, it drained my phone and made it glitch. It took about 5 months to download and I get creepy messages from the app, like i see you or we are coming. I’m very scared please don’t get this app

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: Don’t even know why this app is still here I downloaded it because you know the president.. and it was just what I expected. Super glitchy the worstttt graphics just take it down now

attributes.title: This app made my house haunted
attributes.review: Soon after downloading this app me and my family started to witness supernatural events occurring. After calling the Catholic Church they said this app was attracting unfriendly spirits. WARNING for the safety of your family do NOT get this app.
